options.content: Summary of device health for the full cluster

targets.expr: sum(max(system_overall_health * on (system) (stamp_config{system!="", stamp=~"$available_stamps"})) by (system) == bool 1) + sum(max(system_overall_health * on (system) (stamp_config{system!="", stamp=~"$available_stamps"})) by (system) == bool 2)

sum(group((system_overall_health * on (system) (stamp_config{system!="", stamp=~"$available_stamps"}) != 1) and (system_overall_health * on (system) (stamp_config{system!="", stamp=~"$available_stamps"}) != 2) and (system_overall_health * on (system) (stamp_config{system!="", stamp=~"$available_stamps"}) != -1)) by (system) or group by (system) (system_overall_health) != bool(1))

sum by (stamp) (max(system_overall_health * on (system) group_left (stamp) (stamp_config{system!="", stamp=~"$available_stamps"})) by (system, stamp) == bool 2) + sum by (stamp) (max(system_overall_health * on (system) group_left (stamp) (stamp_config{system!="", stamp=~"$available_stamps"})) by (system, stamp) == bool 1)

sum by (stamp) (((group((system_overall_health != 1) and (system_overall_health != 2) and (system_overall_health != -1)) by (system)) or (group by (system) (system_overall_health) != bool(1))) * on (system) group_left (stamp) (stamp_config{system!="", stamp=~"$available_stamps"}))

count(group by (node) ((kube_node_status_condition{node!="", condition=~"ClusterMgmt.*|ClusterDeploy.*|Csadm.*", condition!~".*NodeNIC.*", condition!~".*NodeSwitchPortError", status="true"} > 0) * on(node) group_left (stamp) group by (node,stamp) (stamp_config{node!="", stamp=~"$available_stamps"}))) or vector(0)

count by (stamp) (group by (node, stamp) ((kube_node_status_condition{node!="", condition=~"ClusterMgmt.*|ClusterDeploy.*|Csadm.*", condition!~".*NodeNIC.*", condition!~".*NodeSwitchPortError", status="true"} > 0) * on(node) group_left (stamp) group by (node,stamp) (stamp_config{node!="", stamp=~"$available_stamps"})))

count((group by (ifName, switch_id) (min_over_time(ifOperStatus[5m])!=1) or (group by (ifName, switch_id) (changes(ifLastChange[10m])>0) * 2) or (group by (ifName, switch_id)  (label_replace(label_replace(((min_over_time(linkmon_switch_oper_status[5m]) != 1)) or ((changes(linkmon_switch_carrier_changes[10m]) > 0) * 2) , "ifName", "$1", "port", "(.*)"), "switch_id", "$1", "switch", "(.*)")))) * on (ifName, switch_id) group_left (conn_type, node, device) (interface_watch_list{stamp=~"$available_stamps"} unless on (node) (kube_node_status_condition{condition="Ready",status="true"} == 0 or on (node) kube_node_spec_taint{job="kube-state-metrics",key="node.kubernetes.io/unreachable",effect="NoSchedule"} == 1 or on (node) (label_replace((system_overall_health != 1 and system_overall_health != 2), "node", "$1", "system", "(.*)"))))) or vector(0)

count((group by (ifName, switch_id) (ifOperStatus!=1) or (group by (ifName, switch_id)  (label_replace(label_replace(((linkmon_switch_oper_status != 1)) , "ifName", "$1", "port", "(.*)"), "switch_id", "$1", "switch", "(.*)")))) * on (ifName, switch_id) group_left (conn_type, node, device, stamp) (interface_watch_list{stamp=~"$available_stamps"}) unless on (node) (kube_node_status_condition{condition="Ready",status="true", node=~"$nodes"} == 0 or on (node) kube_node_spec_taint{job="kube-state-metrics",key="node.kubernetes.io/unreachable",effect="NoSchedule", node=~"$nodes"} == 1) ) by (stamp)

count by (stamp)(
(
((group by (ifName, switch_id) (changes(ifLastChange[10m])>0) ) or (group by (ifName, switch_id)  (label_replace(label_replace(((changes(linkmon_switch_carrier_changes[10m]) > 0) ) , "ifName", "$1", "port", "(.*)"), "switch_id", "$1", "switch", "(.*)"))))

unless

(group by (ifName, switch_id) (min_over_time(ifOperStatus[10m])!=1) or (group by (ifName, switch_id)  (label_replace(label_replace(((min_over_time(linkmon_switch_oper_status[10m]) != 1)) , "ifName", "$1", "port", "(.*)"), "switch_id", "$1", "switch", "(.*)"))))
)


* on (ifName, switch_id) group_left (conn_type, node, device, stamp) ((interface_watch_list{stamp=~"$available_stamps"}) unless on (node) (kube_node_status_condition{condition="Ready",status="true", node=~"$nodes"} == 0 or on (node) kube_node_spec_taint{job="kube-state-metrics",key="node.kubernetes.io/unreachable",effect="NoSchedule", node=~"$nodes"} == 1))
)

options.content: Summary of system health for the selected stamp

panels.description: status of all systems at the last timestamp of the selected range
panels.title: System status buckets

panels.description: status of all systems at the last timestamp of the selected range

targets.expr: sum(group((system_overall_health{system=~"$systems"} != 1) and (system_overall_health{system=~"$systems"} != 2) and (system_overall_health{system=~"$systems"} != -1)) by (system) or group by (system) (system_overall_health{system=~"$systems"}) != bool(1))

panels.title: System Status over time

options.content: Summary of node health for the selected stamp

panels.description: Nodes with multiple conditions may be double counted

targets.expr: count(group by (node) ((kube_node_status_condition{node=~"$nodes", condition=~"ClusterMgmt.*|ClusterDeploy.*|Csadm.*", condition!~".*NodeNIC.*", condition!~".*NodeSwitchPortError", status="true"} > 0) * on(node) group_left (stamp) group by (node,stamp) (stamp_config{node=~"$nodes"}))) or vector(0)

count ((((group by (node,condition) (kube_node_status_condition{node=~"$nodes", condition=~".*Node(NIC|SwitchPort)Error.*", status="true"} > 0)) or on (node) (group by (node,condition) (label_replace(
    
    (node_ipmi_health_status{category="Overall", node=~"$nodes"} != 0) and on (node) ((node_ipmi_health_status{category="Power supply", node=~"$nodes"} != 0) or on (node) (node_ipmi_health_status{category="CPU", node=~"$nodes"} != 0 or node_ipmi_health_status{category="Processor", node=~"$nodes"} != 0) or on (node) (node_ipmi_health_status{category="Fan", node=~"$nodes"} != 0) or on (node) (node_ipmi_health_status{category="Memory", node=~"$nodes"} != 0) or on (node) (node_ipmi_health_status{category="Temperatures", node=~"$nodes"} != 0) or on (node) (node_ipmi_health_status{category="Storage", node=~"$nodes"} != 0))


    , "condition", "IPMIUnhealthy", "", ""))))     unless on (node)
    group by (node) (kube_node_status_condition{node=~"$nodes", condition=~"ClusterMgmt.*|ClusterDeploy.*|Csadm.*", condition!~".*NodeNIC.*", condition!~".*NodeSwitchPortError", status="true"} > 0) 
     * on(node) group_left (stamp) stamp_config{node=~"$nodes"})
    

    )  or vector(0)

panels.title: Node status buckets

targets.expr: count(stamp_config{node=~"$nodes"}) - (count((kube_node_status_condition{node=~"$nodes", condition=~"ClusterMgmt.*|ClusterDeploy.*|Csadm.*", condition!~".*NodeNIC.*", condition!~".*NodeSwitchPortError", status="true"} > 0) * on(node) group_left (stamp) stamp_config{node=~"$nodes"}) or vector(0)) - (count  (((group by (node,condition) (kube_node_status_condition{node=~"$nodes", condition=~".*Node(NIC|SwitchPort)Error", status="true"} > 0)) or on (node) (group by (node,condition) (label_replace(((node_ipmi_health_status{category="Overall", node=~"$nodes"} != bool 0) > 0) , "condition", "IPMIUnhealthy", "", "")))  ) * on(node) group_left (stamp) group by (node, stamp) (stamp_config{node=~"$nodes"})))

count(group by (node) ((kube_node_status_condition{node=~"$nodes", condition=~"ClusterMgmt.*|ClusterDeploy.*|Csadm.*", condition!~".*NodeNIC.*", condition!~".*NodeSwitchPortError", status="true"} > 0) * on(node) group_left (stamp) group by (node,stamp) (stamp_config{node=~"$nodes"}))) or vector(0)

count  (((group by (node,condition) (kube_node_status_condition{node=~"$nodes", condition=~".*Node(NIC|SwitchPort)Error", status="true"} > 0)) or on (node) (group by (node,condition) (label_replace(((node_ipmi_health_status{category="Overall", node=~"$nodes"} != bool 0) > 0) , "condition", "IPMIUnhealthy", "", "")))  ) * on(node) group_left (stamp) group by (node, stamp) (stamp_config{node=~"$nodes"}))

options.content: Status of switch stat collection services

panels.description: Up if at least one switch is returning SNMP results and at least one SNMP query is recorded in the database
panels.title: Monitoring Status

panels.description: Number of switches currently responding to SNMP queries and number of switches listed in network_config.json
panels.title: SNMP Switch Monitor Count

panels.description: Oldest and newest timestamp of the latest available switch response to a standard query
panels.title: SNMP Switch - Data Timestamps

panels.description: Number of switches currently responding to linkmon queries and number of switches listed in network_config.json
panels.title: Linkmon Switch Monitor Count

panels.description: Oldest and newest timestamp of the latest available switch response to a standard query
panels.title: Linkmon Switch - Data Timestamps

options.content: Systems requiring attention due to being in an error or down state or having failing links

panels.title: Systems marked as error by csadm

defaults.noValue: No flapping ports during selected time range

targets.expr: sum by (system, port) (sum_over_time((idelta(system_network_flap_count{system=~"$systems"}[3m]) * on (system) group_left () group by (system) ((system_overall_health{system=~"$systems"} == 1 or (system_overall_health{system=~"$systems"} == 2)-1)))[$__range:])) > 0

panels.description: Ports that aren't responding to pings (using CPingmesh).
panels.title: Unreachable Ports

options.content: Nodes requiring attention due to being in an error or down state or having failing links, or critical overheat conditions, or other hardware problems

panels.description: Unreachable, kubelet not running, or marked down by administrator

targets.expr: group by (node) ((kube_node_status_condition{node=~".*", condition=~"ClusterMgmt.*|ClusterDeploy.*|Csadm.*", condition!~".*NodeNIC.*", condition!~".*NodeSwitchPortError", status="true"} > 0) * on(node) group_left (stamp) group by (node,stamp) (stamp_config{node=~".*"}))

group by (node) ((kube_node_status_condition{node=~"$nodes", condition=~"ClusterMgmt.*|ClusterDeploy.*|Csadm.*", condition!~".*NodeNIC.*", condition!~".*NodeSwitchPortError", status="true"} > 0) or on (node) kube_node_spec_taint{job="kube-state-metrics",key="node.kubernetes.io/unreachable",effect="NoSchedule", node=~"$nodes"} == 1)

panels.title: Down

targets.expr: (interface_watch_list:status{node=~"$nodes"} == 0) unless on (node) group by (node) ((kube_node_status_condition{node=~"$nodes", condition=~"ClusterMgmt.*|ClusterDeploy.*|Csadm.*", condition!~".*NodeNIC.*", condition!~".*NodeSwitchPortError", status="true"} > 0) or on (node) kube_node_spec_taint{job="kube-state-metrics",key="node.kubernetes.io/unreachable",effect="NoSchedule", node=~"$nodes"} == 1)

defaults.noValue: No flapping ports during selected time range

targets.expr: (increase(interface_watch_list:status_changes_total{node=~"$nodes"}[$__range] ) > 2) unless on (node) group by (node) ((kube_node_status_condition{node=~"$nodes", condition=~"ClusterMgmt.*|ClusterDeploy.*|Csadm.*", condition!~".*NodeNIC.*", condition!~".*NodeSwitchPortError", status="true"} > 0) or on (node) kube_node_spec_taint{job="kube-state-metrics",key="node.kubernetes.io/unreachable",effect="NoSchedule", node=~"$nodes"} == 1)

panels.description: Interfaces that aren't responding to pings (using CPingmesh).
panels.title: Unreachable Ports

options.content: Switches requiring attention due to failing links

panels.description: Time and duration of port issues (port is down or had one or more flaps) - only for explicitly tracked ports from the network_config.json

targets.expr: (((ifOperStatus{switch_id=~"$switches"})!=1) or on (switch_id, ifName)( (label_replace(label_replace((((linkmon_switch_oper_status{switch=~"$switches"}) != 1)) , "ifName", "$1", "port", "(.*)"), "switch_id", "$1", "switch", "(.*)")))) * on (ifName, switch_id) group_left (conn_type, node, device) (interface_watch_list{switch_id=~"$switches"} unless on (node) (kube_node_status_condition{condition="Ready",status="true", node=~"$nodes"} == 0 or on (node) kube_node_spec_taint{job="kube-state-metrics",key="node.kubernetes.io/unreachable",effect="NoSchedule", node=~"$nodes"} == 1 or on (node) (label_replace((system_overall_health{system=~"$systems"} != 1 and system_overall_health{system=~"$systems"} != 2), "node", "$1", "system", "(.*)"))))

panels.title: Down Ports

panels.description: Time and duration of port issues (port is down or had one or more flaps) - only for explicitly tracked ports from the network_config.json

defaults.noValue: No flapping ports during selected time range

targets.expr: (( (changes(ifLastChange{switch_id=~"$switches"}[$__range])>0) ) or on (switch_id, ifName)(  (label_replace(label_replace(((changes(linkmon_switch_carrier_changes{switch=~"$switches"}[$__range]) > 0) ) , "ifName", "$1", "port", "(.*)"), "switch_id", "$1", "switch", "(.*)")))) * on (ifName, switch_id) group_left (conn_type, node, device) (interface_watch_list{switch_id=~"$switches"} unless on (node) (kube_node_status_condition{condition="Ready",status="true", node=~"$nodes"} == 0 or on (node) kube_node_spec_taint{job="kube-state-metrics",key="node.kubernetes.io/unreachable",effect="NoSchedule", node=~"$nodes"} == 1 or on (node) (label_replace((system_overall_health{system=~"$systems"} != 1 and system_overall_health{system=~"$systems"} != 2), "node", "$1", "system", "(.*)"))))

panels.title: Flapping Ports

targets.expr: label_replace(label_replace(linkmon_switch_opt_temperature{switch=~"$switches"} > 0 , "ifName", "$1", "port", "(.*)"), "switch_id", "$1", "switch", "(.*)") * on (ifName, switch_id) group_left (conn_type, node, device) interface_watch_list{switch_id=~".*"} > 80

options.content: Systems with components that may need attention, and link conditions that do not indicate immediate issues

panels.title: Systems with Glitch or Power Events

options.content: Node conditions that do not indicate immediate issues

panels.description: Node NIC Corrected FEC Errors
panels.title: Node FEC Corrected Errors
Node CRC Errors (Increase During Time Range)

panels.description: Node NIC uncorrectable packet errors can cause port flaps or other network failures
panels.title: Node FEC Uncorrected Errors

options.content: Switch conditions that do not indicate immediate issues

panels.description: Average and top 3 warmest NICs

targets.expr: label_replace(label_replace(linkmon_switch_opt_temperature{switch=~"$switches"} > 0 , "ifName", "$1", "port", "(.*)"), "switch_id", "$1", "switch", "(.*)") * on (ifName, switch_id) group_left (conn_type, node, device) interface_watch_list{switch_id=~".*"} > 70

panels.title: Optics over warning threshold temp

panels.description: Switches rebooted in the selected time range.
panels.title: Recently Rebooted Switches
Switch CRC Errors (Increase During Time Range)

panels.description: Counts of systems with partial or total network problems

targets.expr: ((count by (system) (group by (system, port) (increase(system_network_flap_count{system=~"$systems"}[15m]) > 2)) < bool 12)*1 or (count by (system) (group by (system, port) (min_over_time(system_network_health{system=~"$systems"}[$__rate_interval]) == 0)) < bool 12)*2 or ( count by (system) (group by (system, port) (increase(system_network_flap_count{system=~"$systems"}[15m]) > 2)) == bool 12)*3 or (count by (system) (group by (system, port) (min_over_time(system_network_health{system=~"$systems"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (system) group_left () group by (system) (((system_overall_health == bool 1) or (system_overall_health == bool 2)) > 0) == 0)) == bool 12)*4) > 0

panels.title: Port Errors

panels.description: NIC flapping or down
panels.title: Node NIC Errors

panels.description: Time and duration of port issues (port is down or had one or more flaps) - only for explicitly tracked ports from the network_config.json

targets.expr: (group by (ifName, switch_id) (min_over_time(ifOperStatus{switch_id=~"$switches"}[$__rate_interval])!=1) or (group by (ifName, switch_id) (changes(ifLastChange[10m])>0) * 2) or (group by (ifName, switch_id)  (label_replace(label_replace(((min_over_time(linkmon_switch_oper_status[$__rate_interval]) != 1)) or ((changes(linkmon_switch_carrier_changes[10m]) > 0) * 2) , "ifName", "$1", "port", "(.*)"), "switch_id", "$1", "switch", "(.*)")))) * on (ifName, switch_id) group_left (conn_type, node, device) interface_watch_list{switch_id=~"$switches"}

panels.title: Switch Port Errors
